title: Cancel an Order Before Shipping
description: A customer requests to cancel an order that has been processed but not yet shipped.

tasks.description: Find the order and verify its status is not 'Shipped'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the order is in 'Picking' status and can be cancelled.

tasks.description: Send a cancellation request to the Warehouse Management System (WMS) to stop the picking/packing task.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends a stop request to the WMS.

tasks.description: Once the WMS confirms the stop, cancel the order in the Order Management System (OMS) and trigger a refund.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent cancels the order and the customer is refunded.
